term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - partial molar quantity
term.title: partial molar quantity

item.text: Change in the considered extensive quantity when an infinitesimal amount of substance is added to the system at constant temperature, pressure and amounts of all other constituents of the system divided by the added amount.
